description: Allows the mob to move into a liquid when on land. This behavior was deprecated and replaced with simpler movement behaviors.
note: This behavior was used by striders in versions 1.16.100-1.18.10 but has been removed in favor of simpler movement patterns.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Move To Liquid Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the mob to move into a liquid when on land.

fields.title: Goal Radius
fields.description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot

fields.title: Material Type
fields.description: The material type of the liquid block to find. Valid values are "Any", "Water", and "Lava".

fields.title: Search Count
fields.description: The number of blocks each tick that the mob will check within its search range and height for a valid block to move to. A value of 0 will have the mob check every block within range in one tick

fields.title: Search Height
fields.description: Height in blocks the mob will look for the liquid block to move towards

fields.title: Search Range
fields.description: The distance in blocks it will look for the liquid block to move towards

fields.title: Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
